FAQ.section_description: Find answers to common questions about Rose.

questions.question: What is Rose?
questions.answer: Rose is a comprehensive teaching assistant platform designed to help educators streamline their workflow and enhance student engagement.

questions.question: How do I get started?
questions.answer: Simply sign up for a free account and follow our quick setup guide to start managing your students.

questions.question: What features are included in the free plan?
questions.answer: The free plan includes basic student management, simple analytics, and email support.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
questions.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

CTA.title: Ready to get started?
